title: Unfinished Business
description: “It was a cold case… No one even knew or heard of Alana Symone and yet on some level, everyone knew. She was a mermaid, much like the mythical creature, blessed and cursed with a beauty so profound it could lead men to their deaths... all but one.”Alana Symone—Cassiel Garrett knows there is a debt to be paid for her betrayal. Lives hang in the balance and once again Alana is summoned back to a life to use a dark gift she thought was long buried.Cassiel thought he knew his wife. Now he must at last unravel the mystery that surrounds her before he loses her forever.
author: Stephanie Freeman
